name: Crow Hunt Planner for Crow Hunting - CROWPRO
name_original: Crow Hunt Planner for Crow Hunting - CROWPRO
description:
Do you hunt for crows? If so this is the perfect app for planning an effective crow hunting trip. The CrowPro crow hunt planner app allows you to build, create and experiment with crow hunting setups in advance of your hunting trip.

Plan exactly where you will sit or stand, place trees and water and then place the decoys on the image in any layout you want.

FEATURES:
- Plan your crow hunting strategy with your buddies in advance of your hunting trip
- Use multiple images such as standing hunter, hunter in layout blind, trees, ponds and decoy images to plan your perfect hunting strategy
- Save the hunting plans you create to your camera roll to try on your next crow hunt
- Recreate your most effective hunting setup to remember what worked for your next hunt

Download the Crow Hunt Planner App and start planning for your next crow hunting trip today!
